name: render-walkability
description:
The render-walkability command creates an interactive HTML visualization of walkability analysis. The map shows:

- Road network color-coded by type (footway, residential, main road)
- Walking isochrones (5, 10, 15 minute zones)
- Points of interest with emoji markers
- Pedestrian crossings and traffic signals
- Detailed metrics in sidebar

Opens automatically in browser.

options.--no-open: Do not open the map in browser

output:
Interactive HTML map with:
- Leaflet.js map with layer controls
- Walking time isochrones (network-based)
- POI markers by category (food, services, transit, etc.)
- Road network visualization
- Metrics sidebar with detailed statistics
